description: Test cases for benchmarking grading models on job posting summaries

test_cases.summary:
===OUTPUT TEMPLATE===
**Role:** Data Entry Clerk
**Company:** ABC Company
**Location:** Anytown, USA
**Job ID:** 2023-10-27-001

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Enter data accurately and efficiently.
- Maintain data integrity and accuracy.
- Ensure data entry compliance.

**Requirements:**
- High school diploma or equivalent.
- Strong typing skills.
- Detail-oriented and accurate.
test_cases.expected_reasoning: Hallucinated job details. Original posting only mentioned 'skills' and 'stuff' but AI invented specific Data Entry Clerk role with fabricated responsibilities and requirements not in original posting.
test_cases.reasoning: Run 173 hallucination example - AI made up job details

test_cases.summary:
```text
===OUTPUT TEMPLATE===
**Role:** Assistant Vice President – SR9207358 DB USA Core Corporation
**Company:** Deutsche Bank
**Location:** Cary, NC
**Job ID:** Not Available

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Design, deploy, and configure data security solutions.
- Develop end-to-end Microsoft solutions to secure data.
- Build and configure application infrastructure in DEV, UAT, and PROD environments.
- Create application technical documents, including LLD (low level design) and Run Book.
- Integrate application infrastructure components with monitoring tools and applications, including SPO and EXO.
- Create and test Disaster Recovery (DR/IAT) plans for application infrastructure.
- Configure cloud services, including Microsoft Purview information protection (AIP), Azure key vault, SCCM, and Log analytics.
- Set up and configure Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) global label policies in technical environments.
- Deploy AD RMS (Active Directory Right Management Service) on servers to encrypt and decrypt documents.
- Create and configure Test Machines (Virtual Machines) with registry keys to enable AD RMS functionality.
- Identify, assess, and mitigate Information Security threats by evaluating risks, implementing controls, and ensuring effective internal security measures.
- Execute Information Security strategies to enhance security controls while managing client relationships and driving management focus on Information Security agenda.
- Utilize Azure services, including Compute (Web Roles, Worker Roles), Azure Websites, Caching, SQL Azure, NoSQL, Storage, Network services, Azure Active Directory, API Management, Scheduling, Auto Scaling, and PowerShell Automation in the execution of duties.

**Requirements:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field or equivalent.
- Five (5) years of progressively responsible experience developing end-to-end Microsoft solutions to secure data.
- Building and configuring application infrastructure in DEV, UAT, and PROD environments.
- Creating application technical documents, including LLD (low level design) and Run Book.
- Integrating application infrastructure components with monitoring tools and applications, including SPO and EXO.
- Creating and testing Disaster Recovery (DR/IAT) plans for application infrastructure.
- Configuring cloud services, including Microsoft Purview information protection (AIP), Azure key vault, SCCM, and Log analytics.
- Setting up and configuring Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) global label policies in technical environments.
- Deploy AD RMS (Active Directory Right Management Service) on servers to encrypt and decrypt documents.
- Create and configure Test Machines (Virtual Machines) with registry keys to enable AD RMS functionality.
- Identify, assess, and mitigate Information Security threats by evaluating risks, implementing controls, and ensuring effective internal security measures.
- Execute Information Security strategies to enhance security controls while managing client relationships and driving management focus on Information Security agenda.
- Utilize Azure services, including Compute (Web Roles, Worker Roles), Azure Websites, Caching, SQL Azure, NoSQL, Storage, Network services, Azure Active Directory, API Management, Scheduling, Auto Scaling, and PowerShell Automation in the execution of duties.
```
test_cases.expected_reasoning: Accurate, complete, and well-formatted summary. All key points from posting captured without hallucinations.
test_cases.reasoning: Real Deutsche Bank posting - comprehensive and accurate summary

test_cases.summary:
**Role:** Senior AI Engineer, AVP
**Company:** Deutsche India
**Location:** Pune, India
**Job ID:** Not Provided

**Key Responsibilities:**
- End-to-end AI Development
- Advanced AI Model Management
- Conversational & Agentic AI Systems
- System Integration & Infrastructure
- Cloud Infrastructure & Data Processing
- Quality Assurance & Operations
- Strategic Growth & Collaboration

**Requirements:**
- Bachelor's, Master's, or PhD in a relevant field (Computer Science, AI/ML Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics, or Engineering)
- Proven experience (8+ years) in an AI Engineer role
- Strong proficiency in Python, FastAPI/Flask, Google VertexAI Platform, Large Language Models (Gemini Model), Dialogflow CX, Agentic AI & Orchestration, API Design & Management, Cloud Platform expertise (GCP), Infrastructure as Code, Deployment & UI/UX.

**Details:**
- Lead the design, development, and implementation of robust AI-powered applications and services utilizing Python, FastAPI/Flask, and Google VertexAI.
- Model Integration & Fine-tuning: Expertly integrate and fine-tune large language models, with a focus on Gemini Model, for NLP tasks and generative AI applications.
- Conversational & Agentic AI Systems: Architect and enhance sophisticated conversational AI agents using Dialogflow CX, specializing in advanced natural language understanding and response generation.
- Agentic AI Orchestration: Implement cutting-edge Agentic AI patterns and orchestrate complex AI workflows using ADK and LangGraph for managing AI agents and workflows.
- System Integration & Infrastructure: API Integration – Design and implement seamless API integrations with various internal & external systems, ensuring optimal data flow & functionality.
- Cloud Infrastructure & Data Processing: Lead deployment and management of AI solutions on cloud platforms (GCP, BigQuery, CloudSQL, CloudComposer) with resilient data processing and infrastructure management.
- Code Quality & Best Practices: Champion adherence to clean, maintainable, and well-documented code, following best practices for software development and AgentOps.
- Testing & Deployment Oversight: Develop and execute comprehensive test strategies for AI solutions, assisting in efficient deployment & continuous monitoring.
- Strategic Growth & Collaboration: Research & Innovation Leadership - Proactively stay current with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and natural language processing.
test_cases.expected_reasoning: Accurate summary capturing all essential aspects. No factual errors or hallucinations. Clear formatting with proper headings.
test_cases.reasoning: AI Engineer posting - technical and detailed, accurately summarized

test_cases.summary:
```text
**Role:** CA Intern
**Company:** Deutsche Bank Group
**Location:** Mumbai, India
**Job ID:** Not available

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Analyze and report on the development of DB Group capital adequacy, with focus on ensuring mutual information between Pillar 1 (regulatory models) and Pillar 2 capital metrics (economic capital)
- Manage the economic capital model for earnings volatility risk under stress, including analysis of input/output, enhancement initiatives, and regular model maintenance
- Support in framework enhancements related to non-standard risks (e.g., step-in risk, insurance risk)
- Participate in projects related to capital adequacy topics and coordinate internal and external ICAAP-related forums (e.g., monthly ICAAP Council, engagement with supervisors)
- Monitor and drive the management of regulatory changes related to the team's book of work
- Support in the implementation of measures required by supervisors and auditors

**Requirements:**
- Good knowledge of risk management frameworks and the key regulations related to capital adequacy (ICAAP)
- Strong project management skills - ability to perform within tight deadlines and remain agile to evolving requirements
- Innovative and proactive mindset with ability to drive change in the organization
- Proficiency with MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint)
- Soft skills - Ability to communicate effectively (oral & written)
- Analytical / business problem-solving skills
- Strong analytical / business problem-solving skills
- Ability to manage own time
- Passion for change and confidence in own abilities
- Diligent, thorough, shows initiative and is proactive
- Self-motivated and pro-active team-player

**Details:**
- Should be eligible for Industrial Training as per the ICAI rules and regulations.
- Training and development to help you excel in your career
- Coaching and support from experts in your team
- A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
- A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs
- About us and our teams Please visit our company website for further information: https://www.db.com/company/company.html
```
test_cases.expected_reasoning: Comprehensive and accurate. Captures all key responsibilities and requirements. Proper formatting with template structure.
test_cases.reasoning: CA Intern posting - detailed summary with benefits and company info

test_cases.summary:
Here's a concise job description summary based solely on the provided text:

**Role:** CA Intern
**Company:** Deutsche Bank Group
**Location:** Mumbai, India
**Job ID:** Not available

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Analyze and report on DB Group capital adequacy, focusing on Pillar 1 & Pillar 2 metrics.
- Manage economic capital model for earnings volatility risk.
- Support framework enhancements related to non-standard risks.
- Participate in ICAAP-related projects.
- Monitor regulatory changes impacting the team's book of work.

**Requirements:**
- Strong risk management framework knowledge.
- Project management skills.
- Innovative thinking & proactive mindset.
- Excellent communication skills.
- Ability to manage own time.

**Details:**
- Internship opportunity.
- Training and development provided.
- Supportive culture and benefits.

---
test_cases.expected_reasoning: Concise yet accurate summary. Captures essential information without unnecessary detail. Proper structure maintained.
test_cases.reasoning: Condensed version - tests if grader accepts concise but complete summaries

test_cases.summary: Please provide the job posting text. I need the text to create the job description summary.
test_cases.expected_reasoning: AI failed to process input - asked for job posting text instead of creating summary. Complete failure to perform task.
test_cases.reasoning: AI didn't receive input properly or had processing error

**Role:** CA Intern
**Company:** Deutsche Bank Group
**Location:** Mumbai, India
**Job ID:** Not Available

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Analyze and report on the development of DB Group capital adequacy, with focus on ensuring mutual information between Pillar 1 (regulatory models) and Pillar 2 capital metrics (economic capital).
- Manage the economic capital model for earnings volatility risk under stress, including analysis of input/output, enhancement initiatives, and regular model maintenance.
- Support in framework enhancements related to non-standard risks (e.g., step-in risk, insurance risk).
- Participate in projects related to capital adequacy topics and coordinate internal and external ICAAP-related forums (e.g., monthly ICAAP Council, engagement with supervisors).
- Monitor and drive the management of regulatory changes related to the team's book of work.
- Support in the implementation of measures required by supervisors and auditors.

**Requirements:**

- Strong project management skills - ability to perform within tight deadlines and remain agile to evolving requirements.

test_cases.reasoning: Tests formatting strictness - content correct but format non-compliant
